biocontainers.name: phylics
biocontainers.summary: A tool to perform multi-sample Phylogenetic analysis of Single Cell CNV profiles

biotools.summary: A pipeline for multi-sample copy-number variation (CNV) analysis on single-cell DNA sequencing data and intra-tumor heterogeneity quantification.

bioschemas.summary: A pipeline for multi-sample copy-number variation (CNV) analysis on single-cell DNA sequencing data and intra-tumor heterogeneity quantification.
